reviews.review: Un jeu qui fonctionne bien sur un PC qui n'est pas forcément super puissant !
Игра хорошоя хоть и есть неисправности в некоторых местах на картах оружие падает за текстуры ну и подбор в мм идет не меньше 2 минут
pretty good game. Gotta grind tho

Tl;dr: 1) Solo-queue (it means what it means), if you're a masochist 2) Team-queue, and memes are guaranteed  75/25 3) Most of the games are just pure cancer, and if not chaos and memes mixed together, all so absolutely.

CS:GO, a point-and-click horror game for the likes of degenerates, DJ blyatmen, and degenerates(2). At first you'll be playing it because you've seen those funny 'HAHA OMAGOHD' moments from FranzJ, but later on, you will plunge into either ketamine addiction or just flat-out flexing your ill-received comp ranks to impress literally nobody.
Most of the times you'll be playing this would be utter chaos, and you'll realize that there are some players (I shit you not) were developed in a humanoid womb for 9 months, just to act like a robot in game; hell, even bots are better playing the game than either you, me, or them.
At the end of the rope, it's just a pointless-point-and-click game to satisfy those unsatisfied needs for recreation, and not much else to it but memes, cancer, and degenerates
10/10 would shave my head after a hundred consecutive matches of pure carbon cancer
游戏不错，经典不可复制！好了我说完了，结一下帐吧要过年了……
